info.name: BB API Test.budi.live
info.description: The public API for Budibase apps and its services.

header.description: (Required) The ID of the app which this request is targeting.

request.description: Based on application properties (currently only name) search for applications.

response.name: Returns the applications that were found based on the search parameters.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) The ID of the app which this request is targeting.

request.description: Create a table, this could be internal or external.

response.name: Returns the created table, including the ID which has been generated for it. This can be internal or external data sources.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) The ID of the app which this request is targeting.
(Required) The ID of the app which this request is targeting.

request.description: Based on table properties (currently only name) search for tables. This could be an internal or an external table.

response.name: Returns the found tables, based on the search parameters.

(Required) The ID of the app which this request is targeting.
(Required) The ID of the app which this request is targeting.

request.description: Creates a row within the specified table.

response.name: Returns the created row, including the ID which has been generated for it. This can be found in the Budibase portal, viewed under the developer information.
